name: Shibue Strapless Panty in RED
description:
Shibue Couture Strapless Panty

Shibue Couture is the creator of the first and only Strapless Panty. The only true solution to eliminate panty lines, the Shibue Strapless Panty® is a must have in every woman's lingerie drawer. 
The Shibue® is washable and reusable and is held in place by a strip of silicone gel adhesive that is permanently adhered across the top front and top back of the panty and they will stick repeatedly to the skin. 
In between the silicone adhesive is a high quality, laser cut fabric with a cotton liner for hygiene, giving you comfort coverage and modesty without panty lines and unnecessary bulges!
Individual skin type and panty care will determine the life of the adhesive on the panty but with proper care, they can be worn up to 10 to 20 times.
Because the Shibue Strapless Panty® does not have any tight strings or thick bands around the waist it is comfortable and easy to wear fro all body shapes and sizes. 
The Shibue Strapless Panty® is perfect for removing panty lines as well as adding a little spice and excitement to any outfit while eliminating panty lines. 
A protective liner is supplied for the Shibue Strapless Panty® when not being worn.

Colors Available: Black, Nude, Red and Pink

Sizes Available: XSmall/Small (0-4), Small/Medium (6-10), Medium/Large (10-14)
(Shibue's® are meant to wear low, like a low rise panty and they fir true to size) 
Please choose your color and size below.

    * Directions for Application Clean and dry your skin. Do not use any lotions, oils, powders, or fragrances on the intended area of application.
    * Remove the silicone adhesive backings.
    * Position the front of the panty in the desired area and press firmly onto your skin.
    * Wrap the panty through your legs and press in place above your tailbone.

    * Directions for removal and care Carefully peel the panty from your skin.
    * Hand wash the panty and the adhesive with a mild soap and lay flat to dry.
    * Once dry immediately place the protective liner on the silicone adhesive to protect it from lint, dust, and other particles.

name: Shibue Silicone Cover Ups
description:
Shibue Silicone cover Ups

Shibue Cover Ups® naturally blend to your skin to conceal the nipples. They are a soft pliable Silicone Cover Up and they feel natural to the skin.
 
They adhere to the body with a silicon adhesive and are washable and reusable. 

Individual skin type and care will determine the life of the adhesive.
